channel.title: Spotfire® Mods – Using the action mods API
channel.description: Recent content in Using the action mods API on Spotfire® Mods

item.title: Docs: Action mods API documentation
item.description:
The action mods API documentation lists all namespaces, classes, types, and methods in the API. It contains a short introduction and describes how to use them.

Older versions

The version number is the same for all mods API:s. Therefore, there are no older versions than 2.0 of this API.

Note: There will be a runtime error if a new API feature is used without incrementing the mod manifest’s apiVersion property.

  • API documentation version 2.0

item.title: Docs: Action mod manifest schema
item.description:
<iframe id="schema-frame" width="100%" onload="resizeIFrameToFitContent()" src="/spotfire-mods/spotfire-mods/action-mods-schema/index.html"  frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen" allow="geolocation *; microphone *; camera *; midi *; encrypted-media *"></iframe>
<script type="application/javascript">

    function resizeIFrameToFitContent( ) {
        let frame = document.getElementById("schema-frame");
        frame.height = frame.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight;
    }
    window.addEventListener("resize",resizeIFrameToFitContent);
</script>
